name: Pinguino (RECRAFTED STUDIOS)
description:
Slip and Slide Your Way Through Countless Frosty Levels and Stay Clear of Eating Too Many Fish! A Full Tummy Slows Pinguino Down Causing Him to Fail. 

This Game Originally was Made in 72 hours for The Wowie 3.0 Jam!
Theme: Failure is Progress

HOW TO PLAY

It's quite simple actually, just beat each level by eating as little fish as possible because if you eat too much fish you'll get too fat and die...
So when eating the fish its kinda like when you score in Golf, "less is better"

CONTROLS

Jump - Space Bar / Mouse Click / Tap Screen / Controller A,B,X,Y / Up Arrow 
Start Game - Enter / Tap Screen / Start
Pause Game - Shift / Select 
Slow Motion Mode - Left Arrow / Left Trigger, Left Button / A
Toggle Fullscreen = F
Mute = 0
Volume Down = Minus 
Volume Up = Plus
Return to Title Screen - Backspace / Select
Skip (Death, Results) - Enter / Start / Double Tap

EXTRA INFO

Full Controller Support 
Partial Mobile Support
Easily Moddable
Responsive UI
